shows.name: The Bachelor
shows.description: The original dating competition where one bachelor dates 25+ women over the course of several weeks, with rose ceremonies eliminating contestants until a final proposal.

faqs.question: Where is The Bachelor Mansion located?
faqs.answer: The Bachelor Mansion, officially named Villa de la Vina, is located at 2351 Kanan Road in Agoura Hills, California, about 35 miles northwest of downtown Los Angeles in the Santa Monica Mountains.

faqs.question: Can you visit The Bachelor Mansion?
faqs.answer: Yes! The Bachelor Mansion is available for rent on Airbnb. Nightly rates range from $6,000 to $30,000. The property hosts weddings, proposals, and special events when not filming.

faqs.question: How long has The Bachelor filmed at the mansion?
faqs.answer: The Bachelor has filmed at Villa de la Vina since Season 11 in 2007. The production rents the property for approximately 42 days per season.

meta.title: The Bachelor Filming Locations | Every Destination, Resort & Date Spot
meta.description: Complete guide to every Bachelor filming location across 29 seasons. Visit the Bachelor Mansion, Fantasy Suite resorts, international destinations, and hometown date spots.

shows.name: The Bachelorette
shows.description: The gender-swapped spinoff where one bachelorette dates 25+ men, traveling to exotic destinations before choosing her final rose recipient.

faqs.question: Does The Bachelorette film at the Bachelor Mansion?
faqs.answer: Yes, The Bachelorette uses the same Bachelor Mansion (Villa de la Vina) for the first few weeks of filming before traveling to various domestic and international destinations.

meta.title: The Bachelorette Filming Locations | Complete Destination Guide
meta.description: Explore every Bachelorette filming location. From the iconic mansion to fantasy suite destinations around the world.

shows.name: Love Is Blind
shows.description: Singles try to find love sight unseen in dating pods before meeting face-to-face, getting engaged, and deciding whether to marry at the altar.

faqs.question: Where are the Love Is Blind pods located?
faqs.answer: The Love Is Blind pods are located at LA North Studios in Santa Clarita, California. Season 1 filmed at Trilith Studios in Fayetteville, Georgia. The pods are approximately 12x12 feet each.

faqs.question: Where does Love Is Blind film the Mexico retreat?
faqs.answer: Love Is Blind has filmed couple retreats at Grand Velas Riviera Maya (Seasons 1, 5), TRS Coral Hotel in Canc√∫n (Season 2), TRS Yucatan (Season 4), and various all-inclusive resorts in Mexico's Riviera Maya.

faqs.question: Can you book the Love Is Blind resort?
faqs.answer: Yes! The Mexico resorts used for Love Is Blind are publicly bookable. Grand Velas Riviera Maya starts around $800-1,500/night, and TRS Hotels range from $400-1,000/night, all-inclusive.

meta.title: Love Is Blind Filming Locations | Pods, Mexico Resorts & City Venues
meta.description: Complete guide to Love Is Blind filming locations. Visit the pods in Santa Clarita, book the Mexico retreat resorts, and explore date venues in all 9 cities.

shows.name: Too Hot to Handle
shows.description: Attractive singles must abstain from sexual contact to win a $100,000 prize while living together in a luxury villa monitored by AI assistant Lana.

faqs.question: Where is the Too Hot to Handle villa?
faqs.answer: Too Hot to Handle has filmed at multiple villas: Casa Tau in Punta Mita, Mexico (Season 1), Turtle Tail Estate in Turks and Caicos (Seasons 2-3), and Emerald Pavilion in Turks and Caicos (Seasons 4-6).

faqs.question: Can you rent the Too Hot to Handle villa?
faqs.answer: Yes! Casa Tau rents for $11,500-15,660/night through Casa Bay Villas. Emerald Pavilion rents for $8,700-27,000/night. Turtle Tail Estate sold for $20.25 million and is no longer available.

meta.title: Too Hot to Handle Villa Locations | Rent the THTH House
meta.description: Rent the Too Hot to Handle villas! Complete guide to Casa Tau ($11,500/night), Emerald Pavilion ($8,700/night), and all THTH filming locations.

shows.name: Love Island USA
shows.description: Singles couple up in a villa and compete in challenges while viewers vote for their favorite couples. New arrivals shake up existing relationships.

faqs.question: Where is the Love Island USA villa?
faqs.answer: Love Island USA Seasons 5-7 film at a custom-built 45,000 square foot villa in Fiji's Mamanuca Islands. Earlier seasons filmed in Las Vegas (S2), Hawaii (S3), and Santa Barbara (S4).

faqs.question: Can you visit the Love Island USA villa in Fiji?
faqs.answer: The Love Island USA villa is custom-built for production and not publicly available. However, nearby resorts like Sheraton Tokoriki Island and Matamanoa Island Resort offer similar Fiji experiences.

meta.title: Love Island USA Villa Location | Fiji, Las Vegas & All Filming Sites
meta.description: Where is the Love Island USA villa? Complete guide to the Fiji villa, Casa Amor locations, and all 7 seasons of filming locations.

shows.name: Bachelor in Paradise
shows.description: Bachelor Nation alumni get a second chance at love in a tropical paradise, with rose ceremonies determining who stays and new arrivals shaking up relationships.

faqs.question: Where is Bachelor in Paradise filmed?
faqs.answer: Bachelor in Paradise filmed at Playa Escondida Resort in Sayulita, Mexico for Seasons 2-9 (2015-2023). Season 10 (2025) moved to Azura Beach Resort in Playa Samara, Costa Rica.

faqs.question: Can you stay at the Bachelor in Paradise resort?
faqs.answer: Yes! Playa Escondida Resort in Sayulita is fully bookable ($165-495/night) and markets itself as the BIP filming location. The new Azura Beach Resort in Costa Rica is also publicly bookable.

faqs.question: What is the Boom Boom Room on Bachelor in Paradise?
faqs.answer: The Boom Boom Room is the only air-conditioned room at Playa Escondida Resort, where couples can have private time. It has become iconic in BIP lore.

meta.title: Bachelor in Paradise Filming Location | Playa Escondida & Azura Resort
meta.description: Stay at the Bachelor in Paradise resort! Book Playa Escondida in Mexico ($165/night) or the new Azura Beach Resort in Costa Rica. Complete visitor guide.

shows.name: Perfect Match
shows.description: Netflix reality star alumni compete to form the strongest couples through strategic matchmaking, living together in a tropical villa.

faqs.question: Where is Perfect Match filmed?
faqs.answer: Perfect Match films at a luxury villa in Panama. The exact location is kept private during production.

meta.title: Perfect Match Filming Location | Netflix Villa Guide
meta.description: Discover where Perfect Match is filmed. Complete guide to the Netflix dating show's Panama villa location.

shows.name: The Ultimatum
shows.description: Couples on the verge of marriage give each other ultimatums, then swap partners for a trial marriage before deciding their fate.

faqs.question: Where is The Ultimatum filmed?
faqs.answer: The Ultimatum primarily films in Austin, Texas. The show uses various apartments and venues around the city for the trial marriages and group gatherings.

meta.title: The Ultimatum Filming Locations | Austin & LA Venues
meta.description: Explore The Ultimatum filming locations in Austin, Texas and Los Angeles.

shows.name: Temptation Island
shows.description: Couples test their relationships by living separately with singles on a tropical island, facing temptations that challenge their commitment.

faqs.question: Where is Temptation Island filmed?
faqs.answer: The revival of Temptation Island films in Maui, Hawaii. The show uses luxury villas and the Andaz Maui resort for various date locations.

meta.title: Temptation Island Filming Location | Maui Hawaii Guide
meta.description: Visit the Temptation Island filming location in Maui, Hawaii. Stay at the same resorts and visit the beaches from the show.

shows.name: FBoy Island
shows.description: Three women try to distinguish between 'Nice Guys' and 'FBoys' while dating on a tropical island, with $100,000 on the line.

faqs.question: Where is FBoy Island filmed?
faqs.answer: FBoy Island Season 1 filmed in the Cayman Islands. Season 2 filmed in Cabo San Lucas, Mexico, and Season 3 filmed in New Caledonia.

meta.title: FBoy Island Filming Locations | Cabo, Cayman Islands & More
meta.description: Discover FBoy Island filming locations across the Cayman Islands, Cabo San Lucas, and New Caledonia.
